name: @Home
keywords: iot, sensors, home, cloud, web, air, luminosity, temperature, humidity, noise
description: @Home is a set of smart devices enabling to monitor a house's environment and the possible effects on human health. A smartphone application communicating with sensing devices put into the house, enable the user to get advices, tips and solutions to potential problems, and to communicate with other members of @Home community, to be able to live better at home.
